member.name: M:horizonsb.api.Controllers.API.Admin.AccountsController.PostAccountRegisterAsync(horizonsb.commons.vm.Dtos.Admin.Roles.UserForRegistrationUiModel)
member.summary: POST : Register a new user.
member.param: managedUserVM the managed user View Model
member.remarks: return a ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) if the new user is registered or 400 (Bad Request) if the login or email is already in use or Validation Request Model Error

member.name: M:horizonsb.api.Controllers.API.Admin.AccountsController.PutAccountActivateAsync(System.Guid,horizonsb.commons.vm.Dtos.Admin.Accounts.AccountForActivationModification)
member.summary: PUT : Activate the registered user.
member.param: registeredUser Registered User Id to be activated
member.remarks: return the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the activated user in body, or status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the user couldn't be activated
member.response: (OK) and the activated user in body

member.name: M:horizonsb.api.Controllers.API.Admin.AccountsController.PostAccountChangePasswordAsync(horizonsb.commons.vm.Dtos.Admin.Accounts.AccountWithNewPasswordModification)
member.summary: POST /account/change_password : changes the current user's password
member.remarks: return the current user
member.response: 200 (OK) and the updated user in body
500 (Internal Server Error) if the user couldn't be updated

member.name: M:horizonsb.api.Controllers.API.Admin.AccountsController.PostAccountResetPasswordInitAsync
member.summary: PUT /account/reset_password/init : Send an email to reset the password of the user
member.remarks: return the current user
member.response: 200 (OK) and the updated user in body
500 (Internal Server Error) if the user couldn't be updated

member.name: M:horizonsb.api.Controllers.API.Admin.AccountsController.PostAccountResetPasswordFinishAsync(horizonsb.commons.vm.Dtos.Admin.Accounts.AccountWithNewPasswordModification)
member.summary: POST /account/reset_password/finish : Finish to reset the password of the user
member.remarks: return the current user
member.response: 200 (OK) and the updated user in body
500 (Internal Server Error) if the user couldn't be updated
